mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.* FROM product p Join p_category c ON p.category_code = c.category_code

SELECT * FROM( SELECT p.p_no, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_detail, p.p_color, row_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p_name desc) as rnum, pi.stored_file_name, pi.file_number, pi.origin_file_name FROM product p JOIN p_image pi ON p.p_no=pi.p_no) WHERE rnum between #{displayPost} and #{postNum}

SELECT p.p_no, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_detail, pi.stored_file_name, pi.file_number, pi.origin_file_name, r.r_no, r.r_content, r.r_star FROM product p JOIN p_image pi ON p.p_no = pi.p_no JOIN p_review r ON p.p_no = r.p_no AND p.p_no = #{pNo}
SELECT * FROM p_category ORDER BY category_code desc
SELECT p.*, s.* FROM p_d_category p JOIN p_category s ON p.category_code = s.category_code ORDER BY p.category_code desc
